name: Three Track Stack
description:
Three Track Stack

A game I made in 1 week, for a series of weekly game challenges. 

Weekly Challenge: "Dont Stop"

Through some series of unfortunate events, you’ve found yourself stranded on a train that won't stop, with only 3 pieces of the track avaliable. 

Take the track from the back of the line to the front and lay it in front of the train. Don't get distracted or you’ll crash. Carry your train as far as you can. 

Controls:

  • Left: A
  • Right: D
  • Pickup: W
  • Put Down: S
